title: Conditional Statements in Shell Programming
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use conditional statements in shell programming to make logical decisions. You'll practice writing if-else statements, using elif for multiple conditions, performing numeric and string comparisons, and combining conditions with logical operators. By the end of this lab, you'll be able to create shell scripts that can make decisions based on various conditions.

meta.title: Shell Programming: Mastering Conditional Statements and Logical Operations
meta.description: Learn to use if-else statements, elif clauses, numeric and string comparisons, and logical operators in shell programming to create decision-making scripts.
meta.keywords: shell programming, conditional statements, if-else, elif, numeric comparisons, string comparisons, logical operators, bash scripting
